name: Fly, Away!
description:
Fly, Away! is a game made for the  My First Game Jam: Winter 2022 jam.

"the world is getting polluted with garbage, your work as a nature pixie is to clean it up, but take care of the dirty flies, they will try to steal you before you throw the garbage. your only weapon to avoid them will be some stones in the floor, and of course your skills"
